Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CssConstants
    Constants used by nodes for JavaFX CSS.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Entry point for application.
    Configuration
    This class is responsible for getters and setters for various configuration parameters, as well as path resolution for configuration files.
    Controller
    Root container for application that manages changes between presenters.
    Errors
    Wrapper to access bundled resource for errors.
    Factory
    Factory that returns singletons of various objects needed by the application.
    Help
    Wrapper to access bundled resource for errors.
    InternalProperties
    A helper class for loading internal property strings from the resource bundle.
    Labels
    Wrapper to access bundled resource for labels.
    Messages
    Wrapper to access bundled resource for messages.
    TextFactory
    Convenience class for getting text from the resource bundles.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Configuration.ConfigFile  
    Errors.ErrorKey  
    Help.HelpKey  
    InternalProperties.InternalPropertyKey  
    Labels.LabelKey  
    Messages.MessageKey  
    Page
    A simple enumeration that is used to control flow in the application.
